text: A pretty decent overview of the computing industry with some extrapolation to the future: <https://medium.com/@cdixon/what-s-next-in-computing-e54b870b80cc#.g9srkho9h>

attachments.title: What’s Next in Computing?
attachments.text: The computing industry progresses in two mostly independent cycles: financial and product cycles. There has been a lot o…

text: Also Benedict Evans (sorry not our Evans) sends out a newsletter every week with great articles about the computing industry: <https://twitter.com/BenedictEvans>
